PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CompressorPHistory
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Compressor performance history attributes.

PropertyDef.Name: CompressorCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: The product of the ideal capacity and the overall volumetric efficiency of the compressor.

PropertyDef.Name: VolumetricEfficiency
PropertyDef.Definition: Ratio of the actual volume of gas entering the compressor to the theoretical displacement of the compressor.

PropertyDef.Name: CompressionEfficiency
PropertyDef.Definition: Ratio of the work required for isentropic compression of the gas to the work delivered to the gas within the compression volume (as obtained by measurement).

PropertyDef.Name: MechanicalEfficiency
PropertyDef.Definition: Ratio of the work (as measured) delivered to the gas to the work input to the compressor shaft.

PropertyDef.Name: IsentropicEfficiency
PropertyDef.Definition: Ratio of the work required for isentropic compression of the gas to work input to the compressor shaft.

PropertyDef.Name: CompressorTotalEfficiency
PropertyDef.Definition: Ratio of the thermal cooling capacity to electrical input.

PropertyDef.Name: ShaftPower
PropertyDef.Definition: The actual shaft power input to the compressor.

PropertyDef.Name: InputPower
PropertyDef.Definition: Input power to the compressor motor.

PropertyDef.Name: FullLoadRatioCurve
PropertyDef.Definition: Ratio of actual power to full load power as a quadratic function of part load, at certain condensing and evaporating temperature, FracFullLoadPower = f ( PartLoadRatio).
